name: Xargon Remake Ep. 2.
description:
This is the second episode of the remake of the classical 1993 DOS game Xargon. The download consists of a zipx file, so be sure that you have a program that can extract files of this type.

If you have any questions, or have encountered any bugs/glitches, then please don't hesitate to inform me asap via my email: salman.yehonatan@gmail.com.

Please read the following important remarks:

- Xargon Remake Ep. 2 is compatible FOR WINDOWS ONLY.

- Xargon Remake Ep. 2 can be played ONLY WITH A KEYBOARD (other input devices like mouse/controller are not supported).

- The game resolusion is adjusted for 1920x1080, so be sure that your monitor screen is at least of this size (for monitors of a bigger size the game should stretch accordingly).

- Xargon Remake Ep. 2 is a browser game so that the file application is of type Chrome.
